mapper.select: select a.name, a.ACCOMMODATION_NO, a.ACCOMMODATION_TYPE, a.POST_NO, r.CHECK_IN_TIME from ACCOMMODATION a JOIN ROOM r ON r.ACCOMMODATION_NO = a.ACCOMMODATION_NO ORDER BY a.ACCOMMODATION_NO LIMIT #{pi.boardLimit} OFFSET #{pi.offset}
SELECT COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(r2.rating), 1), 0) AS avgRate FROM room r JOIN review r2 ON r.ROOM_NO = r2.ROOM_NO where r.ACCOMMODATION_NO = #{boardNo}
select count(*) from ACCOMMODATION a JOIN ROOM r ON r.ACCOMMODATION_NO = a.ACCOMMODATION_NO
